This is a script for plotting a shapefile in R using ggplot2.

Sources: 
 * Method
    + https://github.com/hadley/ggplot2/wiki/plotting-polygon-shapefiles
 * Data
    + http://www.sharegeo.ac.uk/handle/10672/51?show=full

```{r}
#Load the required packages
require("rgdal")
require("maptools")
require("ggplot2")
require("plyr")

#Load the shapefile data
setwd("~/R/HealthMapping/shapefiles/GBPostcodeAreas") #The shapefiles need to be in the working directory
UKpostcodes <- readOGR(dsn=".", layer="gb_pca_2010")
```
